TextAsset.value: Psst. Hey, kid.
I mean. Fellow student.
(Uh, is he talking to me?)
(He’s got a kind of dangerous outsider vibe going on.)
(I kinda like it?)
What’cha in for?
Er, what?
Detention. That’s what you’re here for, right?
Oh, uh. Yeah.
Yeah.
Detention. It’s a drag.
(Wow, he’s just...really laid back.)
(Like being in detention doesn’t mean anything to him!)
(I wish I could be that confident…)
So, what’d you do? Cheatcodes?
Um, me?
(Maybe if I acted like Al, I’d get all cool and confident too! Yeah.)
Uh, y’know. The usual.
(Wait, what does that even mean?!)
Heh.
Yeah.
I get’cha. The “usual.”
I like that. I think I’ll be seeing a LOT of you...
(Wow, I never impressed someone so cool and tough before…)
Hi, ${slot:playerName}!
Do you need help with anything?
I think I'm okay...
You don't need help with homework?
No?
(Do I look like I need help with homework?)
(Has this delinquent atmosphere already rubbed off on me?!)
(Speaking of which... How come it hasn't rubbed off on her?)
(Why is she even HERE?
She seems like she's really got it together.)
(Maybe she's lost!)
Excuse me, but... Why are you here?
OH. That. Well...
One might say I'm... TOO diligent.
Hahahaha!
(That doesn't sound at ALL like a reason to be in detention.)
(How curious.)
Well, I don't get it, but... What club are you in, anyway?
Why... I'm in all of them!
All... All of them?!
Is that even possible?!
Hahaha! Of course it is... For someone like me, who frequently makes the impossible possible.
Listen, if you don't need anything... I'm going to get back to work.
But do let me know if something comes up! As Class President it's my responsibility to help you and the other students do your best!
(SHE'S ALSO CLASS PRESIDENT?!)
Just know that if you DO want my help... I'll hold you up to my exacting standard. Ahahahaha!
Ciao!
AHHHHHHH!
Hey... New kid.
You wanna know a secret?
I think ordinary student Aki Matsuo... Has a secret. A SUPER secret.
Suspicious, isn't it?
The only suspicious thing here...
IS YOU! Popping up out of nowhere like that...
I'm leaving! Don't follow me!
Aw.
I'll never escape... My dark ... darkness...
This is my burden...
My curse...
My cross to bear...
My ...
My... burden to curse bears...
Don't think he sees me.
At all.)
...it's like bugs crawling inside of me... Really ugly bugs... Of darkness...
I'm like a shadow... Of myself...which was originally a shadow, so really it's like a shadow twice removed and--
AHHHH!
(Oh... Did he notice me?)
Have you been there the whole time?!
Are you creepin'?!
I'm not creeping... You just didn't notice me. You were monologuing.
I've never seen someone do that before!
Anyway, I'm ${slot:playerName}. What's your name?
It's... Better that you don't know that I'm Anti-Bravoman.
(Should I say something... ? He takes himself so seriously though...)
And ${slot:playerName}... Stay away from the Poetry Club.
For your own good.
It's where my darkness dwells.
(He turned around... How is his scarf billowing inside the classroom?)
(I think he's ignoring me...
He keeps peeking to see if I'm gone.
What an awkward guy...)
(Hmm, who’s that?)
(I think his name was Blue Max.)
(Hmm. He looks busy. Homework, maybe?)
(I don’t see how a little guy like that belongs with these troublemakers.)
(Guess you could say the same about me!)
Yo, what’s up Blue DORK?
AHH!
HAHA! IT’S FUNNY BECAUSE IT’S NOT HIS NAME!
C’mon, guys. We’re already in detention.
Whatever you say, uh, NEW DORK!
Don’t pay any attention to him, Max.
Whatever.
I thought this was detention, not...uh...dumb baby day care. For babies.
Y’babies.
Good, he left. Like I was saying, don’t let him get to you.
A bully is just a kid who’s scared of something else anyway.
Y-yeah, sure. Scared.
And they hide it by acting tough...
I wanted to talk to someone else…
Yeah, I just want out of here.
(This place is crazy...and the people are even crazier...)
(But maybe some of them are nice?)
(...Or they’re probably all bananas after all.)
(That strange floating boy...
I think his name was Davesprite-)
so were doing this again huh
well here we go
hey this whole section here doesnt have anything to do with the game
i mean you dont make any choices or anything its kinda just filler
you can just click through
Huh??
you dont even really have to read this stuff its just like
blah blah blah heres me heres a little taste of my character so you can get to know me
get ready to fall in love and go on the most incredible fake video game romance of your life
mom dad i dont care what you say this video game character is my boyfriend and were in love
that whole thing
yeah so anyway just click through its no big deal
especially since its just me so who cares
What the heck are you mumbling about?!
Are you insane?!
man thats right i didnt explain too much did i
im just gonna do you a favor and make a long story short
I don’t know. I really don’t understand a thing you’re saying.
I think I definitely need a thorough explanation..
trust me im doing you a favor
you absolutely want just the cliff notes on this business
basically im a copy of a coolkid from an alternate timeline
i guess i got turned into this floating bird guy
i look pretty suave i guess
i dont know it was a long time ago i think
anyway now ive become one of those dudes in the video game that tells you what to do
you know
a guide
to help the player along and help tell them what pixels to click on so they can proceed
Yeah, just keep mumbling gibberish. I’m really into that.
(This boy is definitely completely out of his mind.)
and i know all the secrets of the game and stuff
yeah this one that youre playing right now
its kind of a bummer but also kinda cool
if youre into knowing all the secrets of the universe i guess
i guess im not supposed to act like i know its a game
meta stuff gets on peoples nerves but who cares they can deal
because yeah i dont really feel like doing that
so
whatever
Cool, thanks for explaining.
I understand everything now!
And I’m definitely not thinking you’re an escapee from a mental institution!
youre one to talk with your space unitard and your antenna thing
aw man i cant say that with a straight face
the space unitard rules
ive never been so jealous of a ridiculous garment
i would describe myself as covetous even
Um… thanks!
Wow, I’m...
I’m actually kind of flattered?
And over a compliment from a psychopath!
yeah see its already happening
youre a player character so youre literally programmed to be all over me
what can i say im a prototyped omniscient game guide
how can you resist
Sure… whatever you say.
man i bet if i was actually trying to play along here i could make up a pretty good meet-cute
wed meet when we both trip and fall into a public water fountain at the same time
actually every step of our courtship would be punctuated by falling into water fountains
its pretty much the most classic way to go
theres nothing better it beats rose petals on the bed and our dogs getting their leashes twisted together combined
falling into public water fountains is stone cold romance
even for our wedding wed be climbing out of a fountain soaking wet all like
who keeps putting these fountains here
it keeps happening
Haha!
You know, Davesprite, you’re actually pretty funny…
Do you always ramble on like this, though?
yeah see you like me already
thats okay youre supposed to be liking everybody at this point
well listen if you stick with me ill tell you how to get through the game as fast as possible and get the good ending
what do you say
Davesprite, I still don’t know what the heck you’re talking about.
Or even what you are…
Some kind of ghost thing? I dunno.
But if you want to hang out with me…
I mean, sure! I don’t really have any friends here yet.
You don’t have to make up some weird nonsense “video game” story about it.
You can just ask me! Okay?
uh
word
why are you still clicking on me it doesnt even matter
youre supposed to be clicking on characters so you can get to know them and decide which one to romance
come on get to it times a wasting
well not really you can pretty much click on them at your leisure i guess
Haha, Davesprite, what are you even talking about… you’re so crazy!
But funny, too…
I kinda like you.
yeah ok whatever
Teehee! Yeah!
No I know, that’s totally what I said!
(Jeez, who’s talking on the phone so loud?
Oh! It’s that drum thing… Donko!)
Like, totally!
(Oh, man...
How can she get away with that?
In the middle of detention?!
I don’t like rudeness like that…)
Uh huh, yeah. Detention again.
Yeah, for talking on my phone in class.
It’s like, hell-OH, of COURSE I’m on my phone, because everybody’s calling me all the time!
Class is so boring anyway!
We should ALL be on our phones!
It’s like I keep saying! That teacher really needs to get off his hi-hat.
So anyway, yeah, Wada-Don and I broke up....
(Hi-hat…
Isn’t that a drum term?
I think Donko means something else.)
Um, excuse me… Donko?
When you said “hi-hat” just now-
Didn’t you mean “high horse”?
I’m gonna have to call you back, Miranda. *CLICK*
Excuse me?!
Are you giving me ATTITUDE?
Do you, like, even KNOW who I AM?!
(I didn’t think a cute little drum could be so scary…)
I’m Donko!
And I own this school, LOSER!
Hi-hat, high horse-
Whichever one I say is the right one, because I’m so CUTE!
GOT IT?!
Ee hee hee! No way!
The look on your face…
You really thought I was serious?
..Oh… Um…
Tee hee! You’re the new kid here...
“${slot:playerName}”, right?
It takes guts to drum-stick it to the most popular student at Namco High.
You don’t look like much…
But you’ve got some potential, honey!
Haha…
I don’t know about that, but…
If you like it when I stand up to you, I should also say I thought it was pretty rude of you to talk on your phone in detention!
Especially if that’s WHY you’re in detention in the first place!
Don’t push it, honey.
(Donko is rude…
Bossy…
And totally full of it…
But also… really cute.
I gotta admit… there’s just something about her.)
So anyway Miranda. Like I was saying, the new kid is KINDA cute, but also, like, totally LAME.
...You know perfectly well I can hear you, don’t you?
Tee-hee! You catch on quick, for a new kid.
(Who is that beautiful creature…?)
(Wait. Is that the right word?)
(Beautiful?)
(More like captivating!)
(Tsk. It’s surrounded by so many admirers.)
(It’ll never notice little ol’ me.)
Haha, don’t be ridiculous!
(IT CAN READ MY THOUGHTS???)
If anyone’s gonna be Juliet, it’ll be Donko.
(Wait, it's not talking to me…)
Uh, helloooo, Galaga Ship? You literally live in a Tuscan Villa!
It’s not a whole villa!
Face it. You couldn’t be more Juliet if they built you that way.
And I think they did!
“To be or not to be, that is the question.”
See? That’s the most Juliet thing I ever heard!
It’s from Hamlet.
Hamlet…?
(AHHH, DID I SAY THAT OUT LOUD?!)
Whatever, new kid. It just shows how much of a total Juliet Galaga Ship really is!
Hm. Well, if you know so much about Shakespeare and stuff…
…why don’t you audition for the play?
(Augh, does Galaga Ship hate me already?!)
(Should’ve kept my trap shut!)
(Uh, everyone’s waiting for an answer)
Uh…
(Play it cool, ${slot:playerName}.)
Uh, yeah!
I mean, I don’t know much, but…
But it might be cool.
(If Galaga Ship is Juliet, maybe I could audition for Romeo!)
(Wonder if I can act…?)
(Like. At all…)
(She's just... Looking at me.)
(She's so tall... her stare somehow becomes more intimidating.)
H-hi there. Nice to meet you?
Hey.
So... You in detention....much..........
(Nailed it.)
Yeah.
Cool... Cool.... Me too.........
(Smooth. Just like the King of All Cosmos.)
(Um... She's not saying anything.)
(Did I say something offensive?!)
Sooooooo... What club are you in?
(!!!! SHE SAID SOMETHING)
That sounds cool!
I like it.
Are you looking for members..... ?
Not really.
O-oh.
But there's always room for more.
(Is she going to ask me to join?)
.............. Could I join?
Oh, sure. If you want, kid.
(She went back into her own mind.)
(It doesn't seem like she DOESN'T want me to join... )
(Hiromi is just a little.... Too cool.)
(You know, even though she’s sitting with the weird kids...
That girl doesn’t seem so bad.
In fact, she seems perfectly normal!
Surrounded by all these weirdos, “normal” sounds pretty good right now.)
Hellooooo! :B
The name’s Jane Crocker. I don’t think we’ve met!
Uh, hi! I’m ${slot:playerName}. Nice to meet you!
I’m pretty new here… I was hoping I could hang out with someone friendly.
Hoo hoo! You seem like a very nice youngster, but I do hope you know I haven’t been fooled!
Nice or not, you must have been up to some awful tomfoolery to wind up here in detention!
Heh! I guess so…
But I could also say the same about you!
What are you in for, anyway?
Fair enough! The truth is, I have something of a weakness for a good prank.
I know it’s not very sensible, buuuttt….
All work and no play makes Jane a dull girl!
As I believe the saying goes.
Something like that. Anyway, that sounds a lot more fun than what I’m in for.
Ooooh, yes! I remember now! You caused some kind of schoolwide fiasco!
Something to do with rolling a bowling ball and breaking things?
I’m not terribly certain on the details yet. Still, I’ve determined that it was mostly accidental.
So you don’t have to worry too much about it! No real harm done. :B
W-well… it WAS an accident, but…
It was much bigger than a bowling ball! It was my katamari.
I rolled up the whole school by accident! I even rolled up students.
I might have even rolled YOU up!
Although, I guess I couldn’t have. If you’d been there, there’s no WAY you’d mistake it for a bowling ball.
Oh, yes. A giant ball, somehow able to “roll up” everything in the school, including students themselves!
Gee whiz, that sounds very plausible. I am completely in awe at the overwhelming veracity of your story!
Hoo hoo. Just kidding. :B
Sorry, ${slot:playerName}, but that prank was more than a little on the lame side.
You would have to get up pretty early in the morning to fool an expert prankster like me with a flimsy tale like that!
(H-huh?? She doesn’t believe me? But… everyone saw it and was there…
Unless… she’s pranking me… by pretending not to believe me??)
Anyway...
I think it would be cool to hang out sometime, Jane!
It’s nice to be around a normal girl like you.
I mean, for example- Galaga is pretty amazing, but I think it might be kinda stressful to try to find common ground with a beautiful spaceship.
Geez-Louise, ${slot:playerName}! You could try a little harder with your flights of fancy.
A spaceship could never fit into a tiny classroom like this!
(But… Galaga is sitting right over there…)
Say, ${slot:playerName}. Do me a favor and take a look over there!
(She’s pointing behind my shoulder?
I guess it couldn’t hurt to look-)
AUGH!
Hoo hoo hoo! Gotcha! :B
(I can’t believe I fell for that…
She really IS an expert prankster!)
(That girl over there...
...Lolo.
She has such a faraway, sad look on her face.
I guess I could be reading too much into things...
But... there is just something about her.
If I were her, I’d want someone to come talk to me.)
Um, hello. Do you mind if I sit with you?
Knock yourself out, I guess.
(This is pretty awkward.)
You done staring yet?
I’m guessing you don’t have anything better to do, but still.
O-oh! I wasn’t... I mean...
(I guess I was staring...)
...I didn’t mean to bother you or anything.
(Jeez, why am I so nervous? She’s just some girl.)
I just thought you seemed kind of...
You know, kind of...
Um...
...You seemed kind of sad, I guess.
Haha, really? We’re in detention.
Not only that, we’re in high school.
Who wouldn't "seem kind of sad"?
(That’s a little... bleak.)
S-so uh anyway... why are you in detention?
Heh. Why do you even care?
Jeez! I’m just trying to make conversation.
What for? You don’t even know me.
Okay, fine. I can take a hint.
I’ll sit somewhere else.
Sorry I bothered you.
(I shouldn’t snap at her.
I’m more angry at myself.
Why did I have to say such boneheaded things around her?)
Hey, c’mon! Sit down.
Don’t be such a baby!
Can’t you tell when someone’s just teasing?
...Fine, whatever.
If you’re waiting for me to say sorry for hurting your feelings…
Don’t.
I wasn’t waiting for that!
(And even if I was, I’m not giving her the satisfaction!)
(That … cat? Girl? Cat-girl?
I think her name was Meowkie.
I like cats...
Who doesn’t?
Let’s see what club she’s in.)
Hi! Mind if I sit with you, Meowkie?
O-oh! Not at all! Go right ahead, Boss!
...it’s “${slot:playerName}.”
Nyaah! Of course!
Sorry about that!
Anyway...
It’s sure nice to see a new face around here for a change!
As long as you’re not a troublemaker!
Eh heh...
Aren’t we all troublemakers in here?
NYAAH! Right! How silly of me!
Y-you must think I’m a real catnip-head...
I was just jokin’ anyway... Let’s just forget about that, Boss!
Haha! Why do you keep calling me Boss?
Erk... I’m sorry... It’s...
...it’s a bad habit, yknow?
Runs in... in the family, I guess...
It’s what we used to call the Big Cat...
Sorry! I’ll try harder, Bo- I mean, ${slot:playerName}!
Meowkie! Calm down!
You can call me whatever makes you feel comfortable.
Er, within reason.
What do you mean, “runs in the family”?
Like, is it a cat thing?
… You...
You don’t know?
About me, I mean?
You don’t know about my family?
Nyaaahhh... That’s great!
(Whoah, she seems really excited.)
What do you mean?
Er... is it okay if I... tell you about it later, Boss?
Heh... Sure.
(What’s THAT all about?)
Anyway, like I was sayin’...
I’m sure you ain’t really a troublemaker!
It’s just somethin’ I think about a lot, since I’m...
a Hall Monitor and all!
(She seems awfully proud of that!)
Hall Monitor? Wow! How did the Hall Monitor end up in detention?!
(Uh oh... I hope she doesn’t get mad at me...)
...Maybe... we could talk about that another time, too.
If that’s alright with you, Boss.
(This Meowkie... she seems like a sweet girl.
But she’s a lot cagier than I expected!
On the other hand, she is a cat...
Omigosh, is that racist?!
Anyway, I wouldn’t mind taking the time to figure her out...)
Hiya, Boss! Like I said, it sure is good to have somebody new around.
Hey, I know! What’s your favorite kinda fish?!
Fish?
Uh, you mean like… to eat?
Nya… a’course to eat!
What else are you gonna do with a fish?
I dunno… It’d be kinda nice to keep one as a pet.
Huh… really? I guess that’s why they keep ‘em in bowls like that…
And why they get mad when I eat ‘em.
Nyahaha! Oh well… Fish taste better when you eat em alive, right Boss?
(I didn’t notice til now how sharp her teeth are…
She seems cute, but I’d better not underestimate her!)
(There’s that cute excitable guy.
Mr. Driller, I think his name was?
Wait, that can’t be his NAME….
Unless his first name is Mister?!)
SIIIGH…
(Huh?
He actually just said “Sigh” out loud…)
SIIIIIIIIIIIIIGH….
Hey, um… Mr. Driller?
Are you okay?
Oh, yeah…
I’m fine. It’s no big deal.
I don’t really want to talk about it.
Are you sure?
Because it seemed kinda like you wanted to-

Ok yes I’ll tell you! I love to dig and drill, like seriously LOVE IT, but my Dad Principal DigDug won’t let me and he thinks that’s why mom left, because of all the digging he was doing, so he thinks its bad to dig, BUT I love to dig, my name is MR. DRILLER for crying out loud, I have a bunch of drills that are specifically FOR digging and drilling, and its SO UNFAIR! it’s such a WASTE not to dig, but dad thinks it’ll ruin my life just like it ruined HIS life and I just can’t stand it anymore, it’s tearing me up inside and I don’t know what to do! AUGH!
(BREATHE)
Um. Okay.
And…
That’s why you’re in detention?
No. I’m in detention because I defaced a statue.
You know… the one of my dad Dig Dug that’s in the school courtyard.
Defaced it?
How?!
Um… by drilling.
You know, with these drills I have…
Because I’m MR. DRILLER?!
Haha. Oh yeah.
Sorry.
SIGH…
No, I’m sorry.
I’ve been snapping like that a lot lately!
You don’t deserve that!
I’ve just been under a lot of stress…
(Jeez, talk about baggage.
It’s like, “Mr. Driller to the baggage claim, your baggage is a big crazy drama mess.”
He is pretty adorable though,
in an awkward sort of way.
Besides, when a cute guy like that is going through a hard time,
sometimes you just wanna be the rock they can lean on.
Heh heh.. Get it…
Drilling… Rocks…
I’m glad I didn’t say that one out loud.)
Hi there!
Oh! Fascinating ...
I wonder what it means!
It could mean this ... Or it could mean this ...
What if it means THIS?!
Um ... Hello?!
Ah! Sorry!
Sometimes I get carried away!
Trying to parse the words of the Ancients in a modern context is tricky business. Sometimes 'dragon' is a metaphor, but sometimes a dragon is just a dragon.
Y'know?
ABSOLUTELY NOT. I don't know at all!!
Like... Sometimes magic is a feeling you get, but sometimes magic is something you use to fortify your stats...
...... Not getting it....
You know, so you're stronger or faster or... ?
I just drink a lot of milk to get stronger.
Like... mandrake milk?
N-no... Just normal milk.
VERY interesting...
(She went back to her notes... Maybe I'd better leave her alone for now.)
Conspiracy Log.
Entry. Um. One.
I have tracked target to the so-called Detention Room.
(Uh? Is he talking about me???)
Target is ruggedly handsome in a secret agent kind of way.
(He is!)
Also blond, tall, and most likely human.
(.........Oh. Someone else then.)
Uh, hey, Richard?
Who told you?
Uh. You did. At roll call.
Hm. Okay.
Hang on. I don’t have a file on you, New Kid.
It’s ${slot:playerName}, actually.
Ah, thanks. Perfect. ${slot:playerName}. This’ll just take a second.
What are you writing down?
Your vitals. For future cross referencing to figure out where you fit into the grand conspiracy of world domination.
Oh.
Um, but isn’t that crazy though?
Ha!
That’s what you’d want me to think.
(It kind of is, yeah.)
(That scary guy...
Maybe I should just steer clear of him...)
HEY!
New kid!
Haw! Never thought a little twerp like you’d be in detention!
So… your name is “Taira no Kagekiyo”, right?
But… you go by “Taira”?
Uh, yeah. Don’t wear it out!
But…correct me if I’m wrong… but doesn’t that name basically mean… “Kagekiyo, of Taira”?
So wouldn’t you go by the “Kagekiyo” part instead?
Yo! What’s with the mad personal questions all of a sudden?!
You sweet on me, or something?!
What I call myself isn’t your BUSINESS, alright?!
GAH!
(H-He looks even more like a monster when he sticks his face up in my face like that!)
Yo... what’s up with that?!
H-huh...?
Screaming when I said hi...
Goin’ all pale...
Jumping like you saw a ghost...
I... I wasn’t THAT bad, was I...
What’d you act like that for?
You gotta problem with me or something?!
What the heck! We just met!
You gotta have more politeness and stuff!
It w-was... nothing...
YO, YOU MAKIN’ FUN OF ME, NEW KID?!
I’M GONNA GET A REVENGE ON YOU FOR THAT!
N-no!
It was just...
your face!
My...
My face...?
(Why did I say that out loud...
Well, I’ve had a nice life, I guess...)
You think I’m ugly or something....?
(Jeez, he still looks mad, but...
He also looks like he’s about to totally break down in tears!
Pull yourself together, man!
...I’m glad I didn’t say that out loud this time.)
No... you’re not ugly!
It’s just...
Y-your face was...
It was just way too cool!
I couldn’t look at it up close for too long!
(I’ve done it now.
There’s no way even a meathead like this guy would be dumb enough to fall for that.)
You think my face is...
cool?
Haw haw... jeez...
No way...
Not only did he buy it, but I think he...
Your face is pretty cool too, or whatever!
H-heh... Thanks...
(What have I gotten myself into...
I just wanna get through my first week of high school unscathed!)
… Hey, ${slot:playerName}… it’s pretty cool what you said about my face and all…
HAW HAW! LOOK AT ME, ALL NERVOUS!
YOU’RE SOMETHIN’ ELSE, CUZ!
Oof!
(For someone so “nervous” he’s sure slapping me on the back pretty hard…
Maybe he just… doesn’t know his own strength?)
(Who the heck is that weird gray girl?
She’s one of those exchange students…
No one else in detention seems to want to talk to them.
I think Dig Dug said her name was... Terezi?
She’s got sharp fangs and horns…
What’s her deal, anyway?!
She’s kinda cute, in a scary way…
But maybe I should avoid the weird kids too…
OOF! OW!
She bumped into me!)
H3H3H3… OOPS
SORRY!
(She doesn’t sound sorry at all!)
Why don’t you watch where you’re going?!
HMM PROB4BLY B3C4US3 1 C4NT W4TCH 4NYTHING
1M BL1ND!
WOW WHY 4R3 YOU SOOOOOOO 1NS3NS1T1V3 ${slot:playerName}
TH4TS PROB4BLY WHY 3V3RYON3S 4LW4YS T4LKING 4BOUT HOW T3RR1BL3 YOU 4R3 >:]
W-what?!
Omigosh…
I’m SO sorry!!
I had no idea…
(There’s something weird about how she talks...
But I sure can’t say anything about that now!
Not with everyone already thinking I’m insensitive…
Wait, who said that about me?! Oh no…)
H3H3H3 3V3RYON3 H3R3 1S SO GULL1BL3
1T’S K1ND4 CUT3 BUT TH4T K1ND4 TH1NG G3TS OLD F4ST…
